title: Mohammad Sattari
text:
Mohammad Sattari (; born 1993) is an Iranian <a href="association%20football">football</a> <a href="left%20back">left back</a> who currently plays for Iranian football club <a href="Havadar%20S.C.">Havadar</a> in the <a href="Persian%20Gulf%20Pro%20League">Persian Gulf Pro League</a>
Club career.
Rah Ahan.
He was part of <a href="Rah%20Ahan">Rah Ahan Academy</a> from 2007 to 2014. He promoted to first team in summer 2014 with a 5-years contract by <a href="Hamid%20Estili">Hamid Estili</a> and made his debut for them in 2nd fixture of 2014–15 Iran Pro League against <a href="Naft%20Tehran">Naft Tehran</a>.
